statements: DELETE FROM robot_logs WHERE robot_id = 'a7fc1f0d-89c8-44ad-9c6d-1a7eb564adfc' AND log_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM diagnostics WHERE robot_id = 101 AND diagnostic_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM error_logs WHERE error_id = 100 AND robot_id = 1
DELETE FROM system_diagnostics WHERE robot_id = 2 AND timestamp < '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM error_logs WHERE error_message = 'Fatal Error';
DELETE FROM system_diagnostics WHERE robot_id = 3 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM diagnostics WHERE robot_id = 3 AND diagnostic_id > 100;
DELETE FROM system_diagnostics WHERE robot_id = 5 AND diagnostic_code = 404;
